ociinstitutions_file_added: A user added a file to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (for Institutions) in a project
ociinstitutions_file_removed: A user removed a file from Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (for Institutions) in a project
ociinstitutions_file_updated: A user updated a file in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (for Institutions) in a project
ociinstitutions_folder_created: A user created a folder in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (for Institutions) in a project
ociinstitutions_folder_selected: A user linked a Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (for Institutions) folder in a project
ociinstitutions_node_authorized: A user authorized the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (for Institutions) addon for a project
ociinstitutions_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (for Institutions) addon for a project
ociinstitutions_node_deauthorized_no_use: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (for Institutions) addon for a project deauthorized
